definition: Guizhou province (Kweichow) in south central China, abbr. to 黔[Qian2] or 貴|贵[Gui4], capital Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2]
expensive/noble/precious/(honorific) your
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
Guizhou province (Kweichow) in south central China, abbr. to 黔[Qian2] or 貴|贵[Gui4], capital Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2]
Guizhou Daily, www.gog.com.cn
Guizhou University of Finance and Economics
pinyin: Gui4 zhou1 Cai2 jing1 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: Among them, there was the herb Tuckahoe grown in Yunnan and Guizhou provinces.
sentences.chinese: 這些中藥中就有生長於雲南和貴州的茯苓。

sentences.english: So the place site of fable "the ass of Qian "have nothing to Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: “黔之驢”寓言故事發生地點，完全與貴州無關。

sentences.english: Guizhou Beipan concrete cable-stayed bridge anti-corrosion engineering.
sentences.chinese: 貴州北盤江斜拉橋混凝土防腐工程。

sentences.english: The Early Palaeozoic strata of the upper-Yangtze region are fully developed in Guizhou Province and its adjacent areas.
sentences.chinese: 上揚子區下古生界在貴州及其鄰區發育較爲完整。

sentences.english: The obverse shows the Huangguoshu Waterfall in Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 正面以貴州省黃果樹瀑布作主題。

sentences.english: Lake Aha, located in the suburb of Guiyang, Guizhou Province, is a medium artificial reservoir with seasonally anoxic hypolimina.
sentences.chinese: 貴州阿哈湖是一底層滯水帶季節性缺氧的中型人工湖。

sentences.english: Guiyang is on a tributary of the Wu River in the center of the Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 貴陽位於烏江支流上，居貴州省的正中央。

sentences.english: Hongjia Ferry hydropower station is a tap station of wujiang River step exploitation in Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 洪家渡水電站是貴州省烏江梯級開發的一個龍頭電站。

sentences.english: First day of music tour, countryside of Guizhou Province.
sentences.chinese: 採風第一天，貴州五一寨農田。

sentences.english: Wu yannan is a famous educator in Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 吳雁南是貴州著名的教育家。

sentences.english: "Basket carriers" are a typical manifestation of rural surplus labor in Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: “背篼”是貴州農村剩餘勞動力的典型表現。

sentences.english: Dong ethnic old women are singing a sad song in Dimen Village of Guizhou Province.
sentences.chinese: 貴州地捫村，侗族老人唱起一首悲傷的歌《哭歌》。

sentences.english: The article also presents the new point about…
sentences.chinese: 並對貴州龍的復原圖提出了新的見解。

sentences.english: In Guizhou province there exist three types of the Nuo opera in three different regions.
sentences.chinese: 貴州儺文化主要表現在儺戲的演出中。

sentences.english: For other aristocratic amusements-like gambling, dueling, and warfare.
sentences.chinese: 對於其他貴州娛樂活動像賭博，決鬥和戰爭。

sentences.english: In Guizhou, logging is undertaken in the forest areas.
sentences.chinese: 在貴州，森林地區的人們從事伐木業。
